channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: In Sudan, hundreds killed in attacks on famine-hit displacement camps
item.description: Sudanese paramilitary group the Rapid Support Forces has claimed it has taken control of famine-hit Zamzam camp, after days of deadly fighting in the ...

item.title: Haunted by hopelessness: 12 Zambians share their stories as HIV drugs run out
item.description: Mothers and children, husbands and wives, doctors, truck drivers and religious leaders are all grappling with the fallout from the sudden U.S. cuts in...

item.title: How cutting Medicaid would affect long-term care and family caregivers
item.description: The federal program is the biggest source of money for long-term care for the elderly and disabled. Republican proposals to cut its budget could jeopa...

item.title: Gaza territory shrinks drastically as Israel seizes huge swaths of land
item.description: Israel's military is expanding buffer zones inside the Gaza Strip and taking over more areas of the territory, shrinking land Palestinians can access ...

item.title: 'Welcome back to Earth:' Blue Origin sends a star-studded, all-female crew into space
item.description: Monday's 11-minute flight featured the first all-female crew since 1963. Here's what else to know about it.

item.title: Did a California wife conspire with her ex-lover to kill her husband?

item.title: Trump threatens new tariffs on smartphones days after exempting them
item.description: President Trump says Chinese-made electronics are simply moving to a different levy "bucket".

item.title: Top former college athlete among six dead in New York plane crash
item.description: MIT graduate Karenna Groff, who was named Woman of the Year by the NCAA in 2022, was among the victims.

item.title: Wife of slain L.A. hairdresser arrested for murder
item.description: Monica Sementilli was arrested five months after her late husband was found stabbed to death in their home

item.title: Renowned California hairstylist found stabbed to death
item.description: Investigators say two men broke into Fabio Sementilli’s home before he was killed

item.title: What to know about Pennsylvania Gov. Josh Shapiro and the alleged arson at his official residence
Suspect in arson at Pennsylvania Gov. Josh Shapiro’s residence being treated at hospital, police say
item.description: Authorities say a man who they say scaled an iron security fence in the middle of the night, eluded police and broke into the Pennsylvania governor’s ...

item.title: South Africa re-opens inquest into Nobel laureate's death
item.description: The official ruling - that Albert Luthuli died in an accident in 1967, has long been queried by his family.

item.title: Zelensky urges Trump to visit Ukraine ahead of deal with Russia
item.description: A Russian missile killed 34 people on Sunday in an attack that Trump described as "a mistake" and Germany called "a war crime".

item.title: White Lotus' Aimee Lou Wood calls SNL parody 'mean and unfunny'
item.description: The White Lotus star said a sketch that impersonated her using prosthetic teeth "punched down" on her.

item.title: Alleged murder conspirators seen in photos at crime scene
item.description: Monica Sementilli and Rob Baker are accused of being secret lovers who planned the murder of a famous hairdresser

item.title: Watch Live: Gayle King and Blue Origin crew return from space
item.description: "CBS Mornings" Gayle King and the rest of Blue Origin's historic all-women spaceflight crew blasted off on Monday.

item.title: FAA says company whose sightseeing chopper crashed, killing 6, is ceasing operations immediately
